reference.title: Pierre's Year Round Stock
reference.shortdesc: Pierre's carries a variety of farming items. While seeds are offered seasonally, but he also offers a plethora of year-round stock.

section.title: Year Round Stock

ul.li: Apple, apricot, cherry, orange, peach and pomegranate saplings

section.note: You can also buy backpack upgrades from Pierre to unlock the second and third slots of your inventory.
